General.Name: Enjoy S.A
General.Description: Enjoy S.A. operates a chain of casinos and hotels in Chile and internationally. The company operates through Gaming, Non-Gaming, and Real Estate Investment segments. It also engages in operation of gaming casinos, hotels, nightclubs, restaurants, event halls, discos, and show rooms; and offers marketing and leasing services. In addition, the company provides import and export of slot machines and accessories; operates real estate business; and foreign investment and operation services, as well as offers advisory services. Enjoy S.A. was founded in 1975 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
